notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Support for this work was obtained through projects PTDC/QUI-OUT/32572/2017: Leads4Flu (to RMMB), CENTRO-01-0145-FEDER-000008: BrainHealth 2020, and POCI-01-0145-FEDER-007440, financed by the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF), Centro 2020 Regional Operational Programme, COMPETE 2020—Operational Programme for Competitiveness and Internationalisation, and Portuguese national funds via Fundação para a Ciência e Tecnologia (FCT). The work developed by R. Melo was supported by FCT through project PTDC/QUI-OUT/32243/2017. Irina S. Moreira was funded by the FCT Investigator programme—IF/00578/2014 (co-financed by the European Social Fund and Programa Operacional Potencial Humano), the COMPETE 2020—Operational Programme for Competitiveness and Internationalisation and Portuguese national funds via FCT—Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia, under projects POCI-01-0145-FEDER-031356, PTDC/QUI-OUT/32243/2017, PTDC/QUI-OUT/32572/2017 and UIDB/04539/2020.
